column108: Melbu Hotell AS, Melby, Norway, is looking for hotel workers. This position makes you work in the heart of the hotel. The service level are always high, both when you work directly with guests, answer mails or telephone. Your main focus is always personal service and being available for guests. In addition to normal working tasks, you have to have knowledgde about Vesterålen, and especially the beautiful Hadsel island. Vesterålen is known as ”Hiker’s Paradise”, and you should be interested in hiking and outdoor activities. We will see that you get the chance to have necessary information and are able to get to know the area. On most of the shifts, you are the main worker both in reception, cafe and restaurant. In addition, you must be able to ”easy” cooking when the chef is not available.  Local and traditional food is an important part of our consept. To combine local raw materials with foreign spices can also be an issue. As a chef you are to work in the kitchen and do the cooking to the restaurant, dining- and conference room. Preparation, production and cleaning of the kitchen is also a part of the position. We also want a chef who likes to communicate and explain the food to the guests. The chef is an important part of the developement and improvement of our kitchen. You will work close to the responsible of the food and kitchen in the hotel. We prefer workers who have worked with tourism before. However, personal qualities are the most important. We want a hotel worker who are working after our vision, and wants to excite! We want all of our staff to be interested in outdoor actvities – especially hiking. Knowledge of the area is important if you want to succeed as a worker in our area. Working hours: 100 % position day, evening and night shifts Contract: seasonal from beginning of May until end of September 2025 startdato around 20. May, but we are open for discussions if you are the right person, there might be a possibility for a permanent position. Payment: according to qualifications and experience Driving licence: No need, but it makes life easier in our area We will help you finding accomodation. More information: Robin Bolsøy, robin@m-h.no How to apply? E-mail to robin@m-h.no Latest application date is 28.02.2025 (from NAV EURES Norway) Melbu Hotell is a traditional hotel with 58 rooms, a new restaurant, one dining room, Mediatheque, a TV-room and an outdoor restaurant. You also find a Fitness center in the hotel building.  Our target group is guests, who want to do outdoor activities like hiking, biking, experiencing the Midnight sun and Northern Lights etc. In this sence, local food is a really important factor to succeed. The hotel will succeed because we have a strong focus on sales and marketing, and our service-level are to be better than our competitors. Melbu Hotell is located just in the middle of the most beautiful region in the Universe – the Lofoten and Vesterålen islands.  Vision to the hotel: We want to excite Useful links: •	 www.visitvesteralen.com •	 www.hadsel.kommune.no •	 www.lofoten.info •	 https://melbuhotell.no/ •	 https://adventure4life.no/
